sentences.sContent: The revolver was loaded with only one bullet.
sentences.sContent_eng: The revolver was loaded with only one bullet.
sentences.sCn: 这支左轮手枪仅上了一颗子弹。

words.tran: 革命的；旋转的；大变革的
旋转（revolve的过去式，过去分词）
旋转；循环出现；反复考虑
使…旋转；使…循环；反复考虑

trans.tranOther: a type of small gun. The bullets are in a case which turns around as you fire the gun, so that when you fire one bullet the next bullet is ready to be fired.
